jobDesc: During my time at Bell I acted as the lead developer on multiple high visibility projects, some impacting millions of customers. Additionally, I designed and implemented project architecture using a variety of technologies. Further responsibilities included working with internal and external teams to carry out testing, determine project requirements, generate documentation and conduct knowledge transfers. During my time at Bell I was rewarded two awards for 'Execution Excellence' and 'Innovation.'

As a freelance web developer I work closely with clients to create bespoke and accessible websites. All designs are made in Figma, and sculpted to effectively represent the clients brand. The sites I produce are dynamic, modern, and fast, all managed via CMS.

While working for BetaLab I primarily operated as a frontend Android developer. Working alongside a team of passionate developers, we completed complex, client facing projects, without any compensation. Instead, what I received in exchange for my work was the fundamental knowledge and skills in software architecture which aid me to this day.

From the ages of 13 to 17 I worked for Kumon as a Math and English tutor. In this position I learnt patience and largely improved my communication skills. The students I helped ranged from grades one to twelve.
